schemes.name: PM-KISAN
schemes.policy_text: Direct income support of Rs. 6000 per year to all landholding farmers' families having cultivable land, paid in three equal installments of Rs. 2000 each.

schemes.name: MGNREGA
schemes.policy_text: Guaranteed 100 days of wage employment in a financial year to every household whose adult members volunteer to do unskilled manual work.

schemes.name: Jal Jeevan Mission (Tribal Villages Component)
schemes.policy_text: Har Ghar Jal scheme ensuring functional household tap connections with special focus on tribal and remote habitations.

schemes.name: Van Dhan Vikas Yojana
schemes.policy_text: Value addition, branding & marketing of Minor Forest Produce (MFP) through establishment of Van Dhan Kendras.

schemes.name: PMAY-G (Tribal Component)
schemes.policy_text: Provide pucca house with basic amenities to all rural families living in kutcha and dilapidated houses by 2024, with special focus on tribal areas.

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana (ST Focus)
schemes.policy_text: Provide LPG connections to women from BPL households, with special provisions for tribal communities to reduce firewood dependence.

schemes.name: Tribal Sub Plan
schemes.policy_text: Comprehensive development plan for tribal communities including education, health, livelihood and infrastructure in scheduled areas.

schemes.name: PMFBY (Tribal Areas)
schemes.policy_text: Crop insurance scheme with subsidized premium for tribal farmers.

schemes.name: Eklavya Model Residential Schools
schemes.policy_text: Residential schools for quality education to tribal children in remote areas.

schemes.name: Odisha Millet Mission
schemes.ministry: Government of Odisha – ST & SC Development Department
schemes.policy_text: Promote climate-resilient millet crops and revive tribal food systems in Odisha.

schemes.name: OPELIP (Odisha PVTG Empowerment Programme)
schemes.ministry: Government of Odisha – ST & SC Development Department
schemes.policy_text: Targeted livelihood improvement program for Particularly Vulnerable Tribal Groups of Odisha.

schemes.name: Tripura Tribal Areas Autonomous District Council Development Fund
schemes.ministry: Government of Tripura – Tribal Welfare Department
schemes.policy_text: Socio-economic development projects in TTAADC areas including roads, schools, and water.

schemes.name: Girijan Bandhu Scheme
schemes.ministry: Government of Telangana – Tribal Welfare Department
schemes.policy_text: Financial assistance of Rs. 10 lakh per tribal family for land purchase and livelihood support.

schemes.name: Kalyana Lakshmi (ST Component)
schemes.ministry: Government of Telangana – Tribal Welfare Department
schemes.policy_text: Financial assistance for marriage of tribal women from BPL families in Telangana.

schemes.name: Skill Development for Tribal Youth
schemes.policy_text: Skill training programs for tribal youth focusing on traditional crafts, modern technology and entrepreneurship.
